channel.title: World 2 polls - PvP and LWC
channel.description:
[b]EDIT DAVIDI2 - [/b]
Read the replies below and post your opinions, then vote on what you think should change or stay the same.
Feel free to vote for '-------' or two from the same question, all it means is your opinion doesn't mean anything :)
(remember, votes aren't counted unless you post your opinion in a reply as well!)

item.title: World 2 polls - PvP and LWC
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:95, topic:419619”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=522301.msg3917135#msg3917135 date=1329318123]
Meh, I guess. All I’m saying to everybody is don’t do anything stupid.

PVP at night has been added now anyway, with some LWC edits as well.
[/quote]

Alright hell yea.[/quote]
Now turn on the server

Shit… pvp?

Inb4raidedbyagl/tom/rey every other hour

Read full topic

item.title: World 2 polls - PvP and LWC
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:90, topic:419619”]I have an issue here, I made Potent for a reason and that’s to stop PVP being a key to building factions and obtaining resources.

Nobody is going to ruin that, are they?[/quote]
A nation with towers and tnt can only deal so much damage to those who defy it.

Read full topic

so we just keep pvp at night? and build during the day. i wont go on a killing spree for the heck of it tho

item.title: World 2 polls - PvP and LWC
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:88, topic:419619”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=522301.msg3916861#msg3916861 date=1329275349]
its going to be on at night remember rey? i asked mitb he said hes just getting server setup as is then he will add on
[/quote]
Oh alright. I think we need a plugin with fog… A forced render distance shorten. When I first started, I thought fog was server sided and people couldnt see me sneaking up on them. It would make raiding amazing.[/quote]
epic idea…plus im forced to use tiny render so im used to it already

Read full topic

item.title: World 2 polls - PvP and LWC
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

noobs are ftw:

its going to be on at night remember rey? i asked mitb he said hes just getting server setup as is then he will add on

Oh alright. I think we need a plugin with fog… A forced render distance shorten. When I first started, I thought fog was server sided and people couldnt see me sneaking up on them. It would make raiding amazing.

item.title: World 2 polls - PvP and LWC
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

omgilikepie:

I say keep pvp off until the plugin for night pvp is fixed. Also only 5 lwc, you don’t really need anymore than that…Put all your diamonds/iron/gold etc into them and your tools, etc. (You’re important stuff) Then you have what? Dirt…sand…cobblestone, I mean, that’s not really hard to get. So why would anyone want to take it, and if they did, why would you care all that much? You can hide your chests that aren’t protected, just be sure to hide them good.

agreed, with the ecception of like maybe 2 more chests cause i have multiple houses for everyones towns and im running out of space…

Read full topic

item.title: World 2 polls - PvP and LWC
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw

its going to be on at night remember rey? i asked mitb he said hes just getting server setup as is then he will add on

item.title: World 2 polls - PvP and LWC
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

I wanna bump this topic to discuss pvp.
Now that we have returned to the latest version of Minecraft, more people are going to be on. With the increased amount of members, I believe pvp could be a vital aspect toward the general obtaining of goods or the establishment of factions. I find pvp to be a good team builder, and with the right people it could be an amazing weapon to be the greatest power of the server. Anyway just wondering if anyone else thinks pvp should be re-enabled?

Read full topic

item.title: World 2 polls - PvP and LWC
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

omgilikepie:

I say keep pvp off until the plugin for night pvp is fixed. Also only 5 lwc, you don’t really need anymore than that…Put all your diamonds/iron/gold etc into them and your tools, etc. (You’re important stuff) Then you have what? Dirt…sand…cobblestone, I mean, that’s not really hard to get. So why would anyone want to take it, and if they did, why would you care all that much? You can hide your chests that aren’t protected, just be sure to hide them good.

I agree with this guy.

Read full topic
